name: Burning Bridges (Global Game Jam 2020 Finish Game)
name_original: Burning Bridges (Global Game Jam 2020 Finish Game)
description: My First Video Game Project I did with a group of expert developer for the global game jam competition 2020. This is the finish product we did.  To  Play, You have to answer some questions to progress ahead. pick the right answer and you move on, pick the wrong one and you have extinguish and answer another question to move on. This game is best play with a controller.  Since I don't have a donation thing set up on here, feel free to donate to me in continuing support of my game design path at @iozzoa on venmo AGAIN THIS IS OPTIONAL.
